TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 包含列中每一项的超链接的 控件的列类型。

span.span: A column type for the control that contains a hyperlink for each item in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的列类型控件创建中的每一行的超链接。Use the column type in a control to create a hyperlink for each row in the . 设置属性指定的超链接的标题文本。Set the property to specify the caption text for the hyperlink. 若要指定要在单击超链接时将链接到的 URL，将设置属性。To specify the URL to link to when the hyperlink is clicked, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置和属性，列中的所有超链接将共享相同的标题和 URL。If you set the and properties, all hyperlinks in the column will share the same caption and URL. 你也可以将绑定的文本标题和中的超链接 URL给而不是设置的数据源中的字段和属性。You can also bind the text caption and URL of the hyperlinks in the to a field in a data source instead of setting the and properties. 这允许你以显示不同的标题以及指定列中的每个超链接的不同 URL。This allows you to display a different caption and to specify a different URL for each hyperlink in the column. 使用要在数据源以绑定到列中的超链接的文本标题中指定字段的属性。Use the property to specify a field in a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column. > [!NOTE] > 和属性不能都设置在同一时间。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果设置这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 指定要绑定到超链接的 URL 通过设置属性。Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlink by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 和属性不能都设置在同一时间。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果设置这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 属性允许你指定的窗口或框架显示时单击超链接，链接到网页内容。The property allows you to specify the window or frame to display the Web page content linked to when the hyperlink is clicked. 使用数据绑定时，你可以通过设置格式的文本标题和超链接的 URL和属性，分别。When using data binding, you can format the text caption and URL of the hyperlink by setting the and properties, respectively. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建链接到单独的页面。The following example demonstrates how to create a that links to a separate page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 下面的相应示例显示在前面的示例中选择的项。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的 URL 的字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的 URL 的字段。

span.span: The field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定数据源的要绑定到的 URL 中的超链接的字段。Use the property to specify the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the . 如果 URL 是数据绑定到一个字段，每个列中的超链接的 URL 替换相应的值设置指定字段中中。When the URL is data bound to a field, the URL of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field. 这样，你可以设置列中的每个超链接的不同 URL。This allows you to set a different URL for each hyperlink in the column. 若要指定列中的每一行的同一个 URL，将设置而不是此属性的属性。To specify the same URL for each row in the column, set the property instead of this property. > [!NOTE] > 和属性不能都设置在同一时间。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果设置这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 当使用数据绑定时，你可以指定的自定义显示格式的 url 超链接通过设置属性。When you are using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指定的字段在数据源中将绑定到中的超链接 URL 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the field in a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 下面的相应示例显示在前面的示例中选择的项。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. summary.span: 获取或设置当 URL 数据绑定到数据源中的字段时， 中的超链接的 URL 的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.

value.span: 字符串，指定当 URL 数据绑定到数据源中的字段时， 中的超链接的 URL 的显示格式。

span.span: The string that specifies the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中的超链接的 url 中提供的自定义显示格式。Use the property to provide a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the . 指定的格式是仅时应用到 URL 的 URL 被数据绑定到数据源中的字段。The specified format is only applied to the URL when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source. 指定要通过设置绑定到列中的超链接 URL 的字段属性。Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the property. 有关格式设置字符串的语法的信息，请参阅。For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来设置格式中的数据绑定超链接。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to format the data-bound hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的文本标题的字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的文本标题的字段名称。

span.span: The field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到文本标题中的超链接的数据源的字段名称。Use the property to specify the field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in . 数据绑定到一个字段的文本标题时，每个列中的超链接的文本标题与对应的值设置指定字段中中。When the text caption is data bound to a field, the text caption of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field. 这样，你可以设置列中的每个超链接的不同的文本标题。This allows you to set a different text caption for each hyperlink in the column. 若要指定每个行相同的文本标题列中，设置而不是此属性的属性。To specify the same text caption for each row in the column, set the property instead of this property. > [!NOTE] > 和属性不能都设置在同一时间。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果设置这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 当你使用数据绑定，你可以自定义显示为指定格式的文本标题的超链接通过设置属性。When you using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指定要绑定到中的超链接的文本标题的数据源中的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the field in the data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置 列中超链接的文本标题的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column.

value.span: 字符串，指定列中超链接的文本标题的显示格式。

span.span: The string that specifies the display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中的超链接的文本标题提供的自定义显示格式。Use the property to provide a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the . 仅当文本标题数据绑定到数据源中的字段时，指定的格式被应用于文本标题。The specified format is applied to the text caption only when the text caption is data bound to a field in a data source. 指定要绑定到列中的超链接的文本标题通过设置属性。Specify the field to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the property. 有关格式设置字符串的语法的信息，请参阅。For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用用于设置数据绑定文本格式的属性标题将以此。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to format the data-bound text captions in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 用包含的超链接初始化表示此列的单元格。

span.span: Initializes the cell representing this column with the contained hyperlink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为页眉和页脚项目除外 DataGrid 中的所有项创建超链接。HyperLinks are created for all items in the DataGrid except the Header and Footer items.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string NavigateUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string NavigateUrl
Public Overridable Property NavigateUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当单击列中的超链接时链接到的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 当单击列中的超链接时链接到的 URL。

span.span: The URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用单击属性来指定要在列中的超链接时，链接到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 当设置此属性时，列中的所有超链接将共享相同的 URL 链接。When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same URL link. 若要为每个列中的超链接提供单独的 URL，使用属性。To provide a separate URL for each hyperlink in the column, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 和属性不能都设置在同一时间。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果设置这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要链接到中的超链接的 URL 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to link to for hyperlinks in the . 请注意，列中的所有超链接链接到同一页上。Notice that all hyperlinks in the column link to the same page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/CS/hyperlinkcolumnsinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/VB/hyperlinkcolumnsinglevb.aspx#1)] 下面的相应示例是一个示例 Web 窗体页，单击上一示例中的超链接时要链接到。The following corresponding example is a sample Web Forms page to link to when a hyperlink in the previous example is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/CS/detailspagesinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/VB/detailspagesinglevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置单击列中的超链接时显示链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame to display the Web page content that is linked to when the hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 当单击列中的超链接时加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的框架或显示网页的窗口时链接到的单击列中的超链接。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. 如果未设置此属性，单击列中的超链接后，刷新浏览器或具有焦点的窗口。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议你避免使用属性将作为目标另一个窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），除了下列特殊值，其中以下划线开头范围的开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 5.0 和上面支持`_search`目标值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指定窗口显示网页的内容链接到单击列中的超链接时。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the window to display the contents of the Web page linked to when the hyperlink in the column is clicked. 此示例显示在新窗口中的链接的网页。This example displays the linked Web page in a new window. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 下面的相应示例显示在前面的示例中选择的项。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Text { get; set; }
.property instance string Text
Public Overridable Property Text As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要为列中的超链接显示的文本标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column.

value.span: 列中的超链接的文本标题。

span.span: The text caption for the hyperlinks in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示的列中的超链接的文本标题。Use the property to specify the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column. > [!NOTE] > 当设置此属性时，列中的所有超链接将共享相同的文本标题。When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same text caption. 若要为每个列中的超链接提供单独的文本标题，请使用属性。To provide a separate text caption for each hyperlink in the column, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 和属性不能都设置在同一时间。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果设置这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. > [!CAUTION] > 文本不是 HTML 编码之前它将显示在。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the . 这使得可能要在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果此列的值是来自用户输入，请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定中的超链接的文本标题。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text caption for hyperlinks in the . 请注意所有超链接列中的具有相同的文本标题。Notice that all hyperlinks in the column have the same text caption. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
